text: Laughter is brightest where food is the best.
author: Irish Proverb

text: Life is uncertain. Eat dessert first.
author: Ernestine Ulmer

text: The secret of success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside.
author: Mark Twain

text: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
author: Virginia Woolf

text: What you know 'bout shark meat, perch, and tilapia?
author: Young Dro - Grand Hustle Mafia

text: Mmm... Fried chicken, fly vixen / Give me heart disease but need you in my kitchen
author: Nas - Fried Chicken
